attributes.action: Reunite Gateshead, South Tyneside, Sunderland, Stockton, Hartlepool and Darlington with County Durham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Is n e one sick of not having the identity of a COUNTY? if the local government does not change at least road signs saying 'welcome to the land of the prince bishops' at the traditional sites.
